price: (4) And that our foolish one [i.e., Iblees][1766] has been saying about Allāh an excessive transgression.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا
footnotes: [1766]- A plural form may also be understood, i.e., "the foolish ones among us."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna yaqūlu safīhunā ʿalā al-lahi shaṭaṭan
